main.name: Wilds Rincon
main.description: Full Stack React Developer by Day, Founder && Freelancer by Night. #WRStudioWeb
main.bio: I am an Javascript Entusiast, with an entrepreneurial spirit, a knack for frontend development, and a passion for coding. I am currently working towards my Certified AWS certifications while working as a full stack developer and software developer.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: I'm a Software Engineer Student and am always interested in playing around with new technologies but these are the ones that have really won me over

education.description: Software Engineering Specialty and achieved a much more thorough education in the underlying theory, concepts, and science behind more complex programming. It was here that I discovered my passion for scalable application programming (web and mobile), the security behind computer and application systems, and found that I have a knack for understanding complex algorithms.
Acquired skills in configuring active network equipment, general data networking topics and computer network administration

work.title: Freelancer
work.description: I have worked as a Full Stack Web Developer. Here I have had the chance to dig in and get my hands dirty with all parts of our software. I have worked with our legacy diferents new technologies, as well as built new node-based servers for new products. As well, I have worked extensively with React/Redux as well as with react hooks.

work.title: Webmaster and Technical Support
work.description: Work as webmaster of the company's institutional portal, in addition to providing technical support to the requirements that were presented.

work.title: Frontend Developer
work.description: Web site, web-apps and mobile application development, management and support of websites (Content Managers, Availability of portals), customer support.

skills.name: Git
skills.description: I use Git for all of my projects so far. I have used Git for version control in small teams and have toyed around with contributing to Open Source Projects.

skills.name: Javascript
skills.description: Javascript was my first programming language that I started using in college years ago. It is by far the language I am most familiar with in terms of data-structure and algorithm programming.

skills.name: React Js
skills.description: I am fairly new to React and really did not like it at first. It has grown on me though and I will continue to use it going forward. I have built a ReactJS based resume-website template (link below in portfolio) which I used as a starting point for this personal site.

skills.name: Angular
skills.description: I enjoy Angular for it's ease of configuration and its ability to get a full stack prototype up and running quickly. I used Angular in a my projects more complexes

skills.name: Node JS
skills.description: Node JS is my server-side scripting language of choice. The bulk of my experience with it has been in conjunction with MERN and MEAN based projects

skills.name: Bootstrap 4
skills.description: I use Bootstrap more often than not when designing the layout for my sites. It is the framework I am most familiar with and can therefore design more quickly than with others.

skills.name: MongoDB
skills.description: I have used many different database systems and am better educated and experienced with Relational Databases. However, for many applications, the ease of use of MongoDB better suits my needs and it is much more enjoyable to work with

skills.name: MySql
skills.description: I have used many different database systems and am better educated and experienced with Relational Databases.

skills.name: Firebase
skills.description: I use Firebase as my hosting platform for most of my projects because so far they are all unpaid and their free tier is convenient. I also appreciate its integration with Github for such simple deployment.

skills.name: Netlify
skills.description: I use Netlify as my hosting platform for most of my projects because so far they are all unpaid and their free tier is convenient. I also appreciate its integration with Github for fast deployment projects.

skills.name: Docker
skills.description: I have used Docker to deliver software in packages called containers. Containers are isolated from one another and bundle their own software, libraries and configuration files.

skills.name: AWS
skills.description: I have used many different services offering for this platform for differents projects, is one of my favorite places, to specialize in the field of devops and cloud

projects.title: Canadian Wanderlust
projects.category: My Travel Blog for my post-university travels

projects.title: Fury Fighting Gear

projects.title: Resume Website

projects.title: Smirkspace

testimonials.text: I have had the opportunity to work with Tim on multiple occasions which has always been a pleasure. He is driven and motivated with a consistently positive attitude. Tim excels at communicating with others and is always willing to work hard until he solves the problem at hand.
testimonials.user: Alastair Beaumont - Web Developer at AppColony
